Examples of digital competencies in the context of planning assessment

What excites Carlos the most is the prospect of self-assessment and self-paced learning, which will enable learners to set their own goals and action plans based on the rubric.

Each learner’s plan and self-assessment will be securely saved in the LMS.

As an experienced teacher, Carlos knows that not everything may go according to plan, but he also believes that digital tools will provide essential information to form a comprehensive understanding of each student’s learning progress.
